name: HOG Anomaly Detection
description: Analyzes gradient orientation distributions using Histogram of Oriented Gradients. AI images exhibit more uniform gradient orientations than natural scenes.
algorithm: Histogram of Oriented Gradients (HOG) + Entropy Analysis
mechanism: Computes gradient magnitudes and orientations, bins them into 9 bins. Higher entropy indicates more uniform distribution typical of AI.
parameters: Bins: 9, Orientation: unsigned [0,PI], Metric: normalized entropy
useCase: Detecting uniform gradient orientations in AI-generated content
